sen.j: 伏見宮貞致親王（ふしみのみや さだゆきしんのう、寛永9年5月27日 (旧暦)（1632年7月14日） - 元禄7年5月18日 (旧暦)（1694年6月10日））は、江戸時代初期の皇族。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadayuki (July 14, 1632 - June 10, 1694) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Edo period.
Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadayuki (July 14, 1632 - June 10, 1694) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Edo period.
Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadayuki (July 14, 1632 - June 10, 1694) was a member of the Imperial family during the early Edo period.
He was the thirteenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
He was the thirteenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
He was the thirteenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.

sen.j: 父は伏見宮第10代当主の伏見宮貞清親王。
sen.e: His father was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
His father was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.
His father was Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Sadakiyo who was the tenth head of the Fushiminomiya family.

sen.j: 伏見宮邦尚親王、伏見宮邦道親王は、兄弟にあたる。
sen.e: Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuninari and Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunimichi were his brothers.
Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuninari and Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunimichi were his brothers.
Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuninari and Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kunimichi were his brothers.

sen.j: なお、父は邦尚親王という説もある。
sen.e: There is another theory that Imperial Prince Kuninari was his father.
Some people say that Imperial Prince Kuninari was his father.
sen.cmt: 自然な訳に訂正しました。
sen.e: Some people say that Imperial Prince Kuninari was his father.

sen.j: 万治3年（1660年）に、親王宣下、元服。
sen.e: In 1660, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and experienced genpuku (celebration of one's coming of age).
In 1660, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and experienced genpuku (a rite to mark the attainment of manhood).
sen.cmt: celebration of one's coming of age→a rite to mark the attainment of manhood
sen.e: In 1660, he was given the title of Imperial Prince and experienced genpuku (a coming-of-age celebration for boys).
sen.cmt: a rite to mark the attainment of manhood→a coming-of-age celebration for boys(元服のファイルを参考にしました。）

sen.j: 王子女に伏見宮邦永親王、理子女王（徳川吉宗室）など。
sen.e: His children were Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuninaga, Princess Masako (Yoshimune TOKUGAWA's wife) and so on.
He had some children including Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuninaga and Princess Masako (Yoshimune TOKUGAWA's wife).
sen.cmt: 自然な訳に訂正しました。
sen.e: He had some children including Imperial Prince Fushiminomiya Kuninaga and Princess Masako (Yoshimune TOKUGAWA's wife).
